bibl.title: The Literary Papyrus Roll: Formats and Conventions. An Analysis of the Evidence from Oxyrhynchus.
bibl.note: Diss. Yale Univ. Summary in DA 54 (1993-1994) p. 168-A. - The sample comprises 258 papyri published in P. Oxy. I-LV.
